S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-3310 ASSERT in MergeSort.checkColumnTypes() disallow legal type conversions
Changed copyTypesAndLengthsToSource to not change the type of the underlying expression, because that same expression is pointed to by the child result set's result column list. Only NormalizeResultSetNode should have a type that is different than its expresssion. See Army's write up attached to DERBY-3310 for a detailed analysis of the role of copyTypesAndLengthsToSource.
